alfredsnippet.snippet: "Those friends of mine who also struggle to get the mainstream of astronomy back on track mostly feel that presenting evidence and championing new theories is sufficient to cause change, and that it is improper to criticize an enterprise to which they belong and value highly. I disagree, in that I think if we do not understand why science is failing to self-correct, it will not be possible to fix it." - Halton Arp, Seeing Red
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Halton Arp on Self-Correction
